issue.title: [Rust] [Ballista] How to continue "This week in Ballista"?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Ballista project published a weekly newsletter and this has been very effective at building a community around the project.

We need to determine how we can continue with something like this, while following the Apache way.
